mods.abstract: Two color window card (black and brown on brown) announcing Storytellers 2004, a night of food and music to benefit Covenant Children's Hospital, featuring Deborah Allen, Paul Overstreet, and Dave Loggins at the Buddy Holly Center and Cactus Theater on June 26. Poster features a woodcut of the sun.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
